user.title: Motis Public Transport
user.description:
Enter your tenant ID, client ID, client secret and resource.
To use this integration, you need access credentials for the RNV Open Data API.
Request acess for 'GraphQL' here: [RNV API Access Request](https://www.opendata-oepnv.de/ht/de/organisation/verkehrsunternehmen/rnv/openrnv/api)

error.invalid_format: Remove prefixes like clientID= and trailing spaces from the value.

menu.title: Manage Stations
menu.description: Choose an action to manage your stations.

add_station.title: Add a Station
add_station.description:
Provide the details of the station you want to add.
The station ID (hafasId) can be found in a json file [here](https://www.opendata-oepnv.de/ht/de/organisation/verkehrsunternehmen/rnv/openrnv/datensaetze?id=1405&tx_vrrkit_view[dataset_name]=haltestellendaten-rnv&tx_vrrkit_view[action]=details&tx_vrrkit_view[controller]=View).

remove_station.title: Remove a Station
remove_station.description: Select the station you want to remove from the list.

error.duplicate_station: This station-platform-line combination is already configured.
